name: Waltzing Matilda Sunset Cruise
description: Set sail from Airlie Beach on a serene sunset tour aboard the Waltzing Matilda, offering a front-row seat to nature's masterpiece. This enchanting voyage through the Whitsunday Islands is perfect for solo travelers, groups, couples, families, and friends seeking a tranquil escape. Experience the breathtaking sunset over the ocean while relaxing with a drink and nibbles on the spacious and comfortable deck. Enjoy panoramic views of the Whitsundays and Airlie Beach, making this a truly unforgettable evening.
includes:
One complimentary glass of bubbles
Spacious and comfortable deck area
All inclusive (nothing extra to pay)
Panoramic views of the Whitsundays and Airlie Beach
highlights:
Sail through Pioneer Bay
Marvel at the breathtaking sunset over the ocean
Relax with a drink and nibbles
Suitable for solo travellers, groups, couples, families, and friends
Available every Friday and Saturday

name: Whitsunday Pearl 2D/2N
description: Experience the Whitsundays like never before aboard the Whitsunday Pearl, a stylish catamaran designed for intimate group sailing. With a fully crewed skipper and hostess, you can relax and enjoy the breathtaking scenery without any of the hassle. Ideal for couples and small groups, this tour takes you to the most scenic and secluded spots, including the iconic Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet. The vessel features spacious decks, stylish double cabins with private ensuites, and modern amenities like an onboard ice maker and Starlink-powered WiFi, ensuring a comfortable and luxurious journey.
includes:
Fully crewed with skipper and hostess
Snorkelling equipment (mask, snorkel, wetsuit, floatation devices)
All marine park fees
Visit to Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet
Great Barrier Reef snorkelling
Intimate group sailing with 8 guests
Lagoon 450 vessel
Four stylish double cabins with private ensuites
Stand-up paddle boards
Solar panels for onboard appliances
Wifi onboard powered by Starlink
Charcoal filtered drinking water
Onboard ice maker and coffee machine
highlights:
Stylish catamaran with private double cabins
Intimate sailing experience with only 8 guests
Visits to Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet
Great Barrier Reef snorkelling
Spacious decks for relaxation
Modern amenities including WiFi and ice maker

name: Summer Jo 3D/3N
description: Experience the Whitsundays in style aboard the newly refurbished Summer Jo, a luxurious mega yacht offering intimate small-group adventures. Perfect for solo travelers, friend groups, and families with older children, this 3-day journey combines adventure with comfort. Explore iconic Whitsunday hotspots like Whitehaven Beach and the Great Barrier Reef, with opportunities for scuba diving and snorkeling. Enjoy mouthwatering meals prepared by our onboard chef and unwind on spacious decks perfect for socializing under the sun or stars.
includes:
All meals (unless you require gluten-free, vegan or dairy-free meals)
Snorkelling equipment, including masks and snorkels
Unlimited hot showers
Dedicated Dive Master onboard
Locally owned vessel
highlights:
Explore the iconic Whitehaven Beach
Dive and snorkel on the Great Barrier Reef
Enjoy mouthwatering meals prepared by an onboard chef
Spacious decks for socializing
Dive Master onboard for expert diving guidance
Unlimited hot showers thanks to a desalinator
Locally owned vessel showcasing the Whitsundays

name: Solway Lass 3D/2N
description: Experience the Whitsundays aboard Solway Lass, a beautifully preserved tall ship offering a unique blend of history and adventure. With expansive deck space, a licensed bar, and air-conditioned cabins, this tour provides comfort and excitement. Perfect for backpackers and adventure seekers, enjoy the thrill of sailing, snorkeling, and exploring the stunning beaches and coral reefs. Solway Lass promises an unforgettable journey filled with breathtaking sunsets, vibrant marine life, and the opportunity to make lifelong memories with fellow travelers.
includes:
Services of skipper and crew
All meals and snacks
Tap water, tea, and coffee
Bath towel
Standup paddleboards
Snorkelling equipment and basic tuition
Stinger suit
All marina levies
highlights:
Sail aboard a historic tall ship
Explore the Whitsunday Islands
Enjoy alfresco meals on deck
Participate in sailing activities
Snorkel in vibrant coral reefs
Relax on Whitehaven Beach
Experience stunning sunsets and sunrises
Meet fellow travelers during happy hour

name: Siska 2D/1N
description: Experience the Whitsundays aboard Siska, a classic sailing yacht offering a youthful and social atmosphere. Perfect for those with limited time who want to make new friends and explore iconic Whitsunday locations. Enjoy a fun sailing adventure with ample seating space and open-plan accommodation, ideal for socializing and watching sunsets with a drink in hand. This tour is perfect for young travelers seeking adventure and camaraderie.
includes:
Services of skipper and crew
All meals and snacks
Tap water, tea, and coffee
Snorkeling equipment and basic tuition
Stinger suit
All bed linen
highlights:
Guided bush walk to Hill Inlet Lookout
Visit to Whitehaven Beach
Sunset drinks and pre-dinner snacks
Snorkeling over fringing coral reefs
Communal meals prepared fresh onboard
Open-plan accommodation with single and double beds

name: Prima 2D/1N
description: Experience the Whitsundays aboard Prima, a charming and comfortable sailing yacht designed for intimate small-group adventures. Ideal for families, romantic getaways, and those seeking soft adventure, Prima offers a unique opportunity to explore idyllic island locations. With a shaded canopy and cushioned sunbathing areas, you can relax and enjoy the stunning views. Each trip is a new adventure, with opportunities to snorkel, meet marine life, and enjoy freshly prepared meals onboard. Perfect for those looking to unwind and connect with fellow travelers in a serene setting.
includes:
Services of skipper and crew
All breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks
Tap water, tea and coffee
Snorkelling equipment and basic tuition
Entry/Admission – Whitehaven Beach
Entry/Admission – Hill Inlet
Entry/Admission – Whitsunday Islands
Transfers to/from the marina
Bath towel, stinger suit, and all bed linen

Small-group sailing adventures
Idyllic island locations
Comfortable seating and sunbathing areas
BYO drinks policy with guest fridge

Opportunities to snorkel and meet marine life
Stunning sunsets and stargazing

name: Whitsunday Getaway 2D/2N
description: Experience the Whitsundays in ultimate comfort aboard the stylish catamaran, Whitsunday Getaway. This intimate, small-group tour is perfect for couples seeking a romantic getaway or those looking for a relaxed sailing experience. Enjoy the privacy of a fully crewed vessel, where you can unwind and let the experienced skipper and hostess take you to the most scenic locations, serene beaches, and calm anchorages. Whether you're an aspiring sailor or prefer to relax with a drink, this tour offers the perfect blend of adventure and leisure, making it ideal for anyone looking to escape the crowds and connect with nature.
includes:
Fully crewed with a skipper and hostess
Gourmet meals prepared onboard
Guided bush walk to Hill Inlet lookout
Snorkeling equipment

Continental breakfast
Buffet lunch

Sail through stunning island scenery
Visit Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet lookout
Snorkel vibrant underwater worlds
Relax on a luxurious catamaran
Enjoy gourmet meals and drinks onboard

name: Summer Jo 2D/2N
description: Experience the Whitsundays in style aboard Summer Jo, a newly refitted mega yacht offering luxurious amenities for ultimate comfort. Perfect for couples, families, and divers seeking adventure and connection with nature. Cruise through the breathtaking Whitsundays, explore vibrant coral reefs, and visit the world-famous Whitehaven Beach. This social, action-packed journey is ideal for those looking to level up their dive skills with an onboard Advanced Dive Course.

name: Waltzing Matilda: 2 Day 1 Night Whitsundays Cruise
description: Join us aboard Waltzing Matilda for an unforgettable sailing adventure through the stunning Whitsundays. This exclusive small group experience offers an intimate and personalized journey, perfect for those seeking comfort and style on the open sea. With a thoughtfully designed vessel fostering community among guests, you'll explore idyllic island locations, secluded beaches, and vibrant coral reefs. Ideal for couples, families, and adventure seekers, every moment aboard Waltzing Matilda is crafted to create magical memories.
includes:
Very knowledgeable, helpful and friendly crew
Wide flat decks with shade awnings
Meals prepared onboard using fresh local produce
Snorkelling equipment and tuition provided
All marine & park fees included

Exclusive small group sailing adventures
Intimate and personalized experience
Comfortable and stylish vessel
Thoughtfully designed layout for community and connection
Idyllic island locations, secluded beaches, and vibrant coral reefs
